hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select to_char(au.application_user_id) as "applUserId", au.first_nm as "firstName", au.middle_nm as "middleName", au.last_nm as "lastName", au.email_address_tx as "emailId", au.cfk_employee_id as "employeeId", sur.user_role_nm as "userRole"
from application_user au, application_user_role aur, stnd_user_role sur where aur.fk_application_user_id = au.application_user_id and aur.fk_user_role_id = sur.user_role_id and au.user_id = :userId

select (select description_tx from code_reference where type_cd = 'REDIRECT_HTML_URL') as "redirectorUrl", (select description_tx from code_reference where type_cd = 'DASHBOARD_REFIRECT_URL' and value_tx = :role) as "dashboardUrl" from dual
